Political Overlay Annotated
Viewport: 40x20 at (100,100) zoom=1
World: 200x200

Faction territories shown as numbers 0-3.
Water shown as water chars, land shown as faction ID.
Quadrants: 0=NW, 1=NE, 2=SW, 3=SE (split at x=100, y=100)
